summary: At Robert Half, we understand the nuances of the healthcare industry and have expertise in finding solutions for health organizations around the Valley. Hospitals, medical groups and clinics, pharmaceutical companies and other organizations turn to us because we understand their unique requirements in healthcare fields such as administrative, accounting and finance, interim management and project consulting services, legal, creative and technology.Our extended network of candidates allows us to provide quick turnaround on your request for professionals who have healthcare experience and are ready to start working immediately. Our dedicated healthcare staffing specialists can supply highly skilled, highly specialized professionals on a temporary or full-time basis, especially in the following areas: Finance and Accounting, Administrative, and Operations.Stephanie.Long@RobertHalf.com
name: Stephanie Long
title: Helping healthcare organizations find the best talent to support Revenue Cycle, Finance, and Administrative needs
